title: Funny Monkey Costume Toddler and Infant
features: COSTUME INCLUDES: This toddler kid's monkey suit costume comes with a furry monkey bodysuit with an attached tail, a headpiece with ears, and a pair of shoe covers.

FROM THE FUN COMPANY: We make the cutest and coziest costumes available and we know your child is going to love suiting up as the funny monkey for Halloween. That's why we designed and crafted this cute Toddler Monkey Costume.

DETAILS THAT MATTER: Soft, polyester fleece makes this toddler monkey outfit a comfy option for trick or treating. And with oversized ears and a bendable tail your toddler will love showing off fun monkey moves!

TOP QUALITY: We use select fabrics and quality costume assembly to ensure our customers get the most out of each and every one of our costume designs. With proper care, this brown monkey costume will last to be worn again and again.
description: The Fun Costumes Monkey Costume for Toddler Kids Monkey business can actually be a whole lot of fun. Kids know that already, so how about we take their style up a notch with this Kid's Monkey Costume! Crafted in our costume design studios, our talented team of artists and costume developers set out to craft a soft, cute, and super fun monkey costume for kids and this monkey outfit is the picture-perfect result. Product Design: We designed this costume as a soft brown bodysuit with a tan belly that zips up the back. There is a long tail underneath the zipper. The costume comes with a monkey headpiece that fits over the head and hook and loops in the back. The headpiece has ears and exposes the face. The matching soft brown booties slip around the ankles and an elastic band goes around the shoes so the booties stay in place. Product Details: 100% polyester Jumpsuit has zipper closure at back Headpiece attaches with hook and loop fastener Bendable tail sewn to back of suit Booties have anti-skid soles Size Chart: 6/12MO: Chest=25"; Torso=16"; Sleeve Length=9 3/4"; Jumpsuit Length=23" 18MO: Chest=27"; Torso=17"; Sleeve Length=10 1/4"; Jumpsuit Length=25 1/2" 2T: Chest=28"; Torso=18"; Sleeve Length=11"; Jumpsuit Length=30" 4T: Chest=30"; Torso=19"; Sleeve Length=12 1/2"; Jumpsuit Length=32" About Us: Fun Costumes are exclusively made by us and begin with passion, teamwork, and industry expertise decades in the making. Our products are proof that with the right people even a simple idea can grow into something incredible. We started in a small garage in Minnesota, providing costumes to our local community, and now we're creating costumes for people all around the world. - Jumpsuit - Headpiece - Pair of Booties
